column4: can anyone help with a kernel panic when i install ubuntu on virtual pc? (i know about the problems with 16/32 bit graphics, but this occurs in next mode install from the alternate disk also)

can anyone help me with installing ubuntu on virtual pc? - i get a kernel panic imiditally after selecting an option from the initall install/live boot screen. The same thing occures in a text install from the alternate cd. (this occures in 6.06 and 6.10, both the latest download cd cd images)
you're not going to get much love trying to install linux in Virtual PC.
